# import/no-self-import <Badge type="info" text="Suspicious" />

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Forbid a module from importing itself. This can sometimes happen during refactoring.

### Example

```javascript
// foo.js
import foo from "./foo.js";
const foo = require("./foo");
```
